LanguageData.USH_GE_SkinSettingExplanation: If the setting is disabled, the skin replacements will change pawn's skin color according to the replacement resource color.\nNote that if you enable it, it won't affect already installed implants. You would need to operate on the pawn again to have the default skin color.
LanguageData.USH_GE_SkinSettingTooltip: If enabled the skin color will not get changed after operation.
LanguageData.USH_GE_SkinSettingLabel: Disable skin replacements changing actual pawn's skin color
LanguageData.USH_GE_WillDraw: Will draw {0} W stored power to start forming {1}
LanguageData.USH_GE_NoPowerStored: Can't start forming {0}: Needs {1} W stored power
LanguageData.USH_GE_CommandSetForTargeterTypeDesc: Whether the targeter should use bombardment or power beam attack.
LanguageData.USH_GE_SolarFlareInterceptedText: Installed banks (x{0}) have intercepted the solar flare and will slowly discharge the accumulated power into the grid
LanguageData.USH_GE_CommandBiocoderEjectDesc: Wake up the contained bioprint host and eject them.
LanguageData.USH_GE_CommandEraseMemoryDesc: Destroy currently stored memory and allow for extracting another one.
LanguageData.USH_GE_CommandMemoryContainerEjectDesc: Removes the memory cell from inner container and places it nearby.
